programme.title: Cinque per l'inferno
programme.desc: Cinque per l'inferno features five men caught in a dangerous mission against sinister forces.

programme.title: Appassionata
programme.desc: A passionate and forbidden love story that unfolds between two characters from different walks of life.

programme.title: The Alcove
programme.desc: 1936. Commander Elio returns from the Abyssinian front. Back home in Italy, his wife and his secretary, also her lover, are waiting for him. The man has a beautiful black girl with him, which triggers perversions and jealousies.

programme.title: The body
programme.desc: A chilling mystery surrounding a woman's death unravels as a detective investigates a complex case.

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: After making his historic crossing of the Alps with elephants transporting supplies and troops, Hannibal marches on Rome in a war of revenge. The presence of Silvia, niece of Quintus Fabius Maximus, creates clashes in his camp.

programme.title: White Apache
programme.desc: Outlaws attack a band of settlers and kill everyone except a pregnant woman who's rescued by a band of Indians. The woman dies giving birth but Chief White Bear adopts her male baby, naming him "Shining Sky," and raising him as brother to his own son, Black Wolf.

programme.title: The White, the Yellow, and the Black
programme.desc: In the 19th century, when the Japanese Emperor sends a gift pony to the US President it gets stolen and ransomed by Indians but Sheriff Gideon aided by an inept Japanese servant offers to deliver the ransom.

programme.title: Murder Obsession
programme.desc: Michael Stanford, a promising young actor, suffers from the stress caused by his job. Fatigue creates large gaps in his memory and makes him unstable character-wise. Therefore, Michael decides to retreat to his mother's house, inviting the entire film crew as well.

programme.title: The Executioner of Venice
programme.desc: In Venice,during the Inquisition,Sandrigo Bembo,the son of the Doge Giovanni Bembo,is falsely accused of treason out of pure malice by the Grand Inquisitor Rodrigo Zeno.

programme.title: The body
programme.desc: A chilling mystery surrounding a woman's death unravels as a detective investigates a complex case.

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: After making his historic crossing of the Alps with elephants transporting supplies and troops, Hannibal marches on Rome in a war of revenge. The presence of Silvia, niece of Quintus Fabius Maximus, creates clashes in his camp.

programme.desc: Outlaws attack a band of settlers and kill everyone except a pregnant woman who's rescued by a band of Indians. The woman dies giving birth but Chief White Bear adopts her male baby, naming him "Shining Sky," and raising him as brother to his own son, Black Wolf.
